titles.title: National Landslide Preparedness Act Reauthorization Act of 2025
National Landslide Preparedness Act Reauthorization Act of 2025
National Landslide Preparedness Act Reauthorization Act of 2025
National Landslide Preparedness Act Reauthorization Act of 2025
A bill to reauthorize the National Landslide Preparedness Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Cruz with an amendment. With written report No. 119-92.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 249.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
The committee amendment as amended agreed to by Unanimous Consent.

reference.label: text of amendment in the nature of a substitute

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: Senate Commerce, Science, and Transportation
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
